mapper.update: UPDATE user SET phoneNumber = CASE WHEN #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} IS NOT NULL AND #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} != '' AND #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} != phoneNumber THEN #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} ELSE phoneNumber END, wechat_id = CASE WHEN #{contactInfo.weChatId} IS NOT NULL AND #{contactInfo.weChatId} != '' AND #{contactInfo.weChatId} != wechat_id THEN #{contactInfo.weChatId} ELSE wechat_id END, email = CASE WHEN #{contactInfo.email} IS NOT NULL AND #{contactInfo.email} != '' AND #{contactInfo.email} != email THEN #{contactInfo.email} ELSE email END WHERE open_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT nickname, avatar_url AS avatarUrl, is_student AS isStudent, avatar AS avatar FROM user WHERE open_id = #{openId}
